remarks: Right cancellation law for the addition operation of a ring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringgcl.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringgcl.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
rngorcan $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G C ) = ( B G C ) <-> A = B ) ) $.
